title: Colombia heads for divisive presidential runoff
text:
Colombia heads for divisive presidential runoff 3:27pm EDT - 01:45
Colombia headed for its most divisive presidential race in decades after right-winger Ivan Duque won Sunday’s first-round vote, triggering a runoff with leftist Gustavo Petro that could upset a historic peace deal or derail business friendly reforms.
